name: Mirror Battle
description:
Description:- A mirrored clone player who has the same movements and abilities as of the player. It depends on how the player kills his clone to get to the next level. Multiple Ways of Killing are possible (If you can find out).

It is also a 1 Hit Kill Game.

CONTROLS:-

A/D:- Move Left/Right

W:- Jump

Space:- Shoot

R:- Reload

Music Made with - Groovepad app (Playstore)
